channel.title: Accommodation on Waterloo Farm Holidays
channel.description: Recent content in Accommodation on Waterloo Farm Holidays

item.title: Haypole Barn
item.description:
Welcome to Haypole Barn

A spacious wheelchair accessible barn conversion, perfect for larger groups and families. Can be combined with Sandmartins for groups up to 16 guests.

Amenities

  • Fully equipped kitchen
  • Wheelchair accessible throughout
  • Accessible bathroom facilities
  • WiFi
  • Parking
  • Beautiful countryside views

Special Notes

Security Deposit: A £100 security deposit is required (returned within 7 days of departure).

Large Groups: This property can be combined with Sandmartins for groups up to 16 guests - perfect for retreats, activity courses, and family gatherings.

item.title: Kingfisher Cottage
item.description:
Welcome to Kingfisher Cottage

A modern wheelchair accessible cottage with all the comforts of home, ideal for couples or small families.

Amenities

  • Fully equipped kitchen
  • Wheelchair accessible throughout
  • Accessible bathroom with shower chair available
  • WiFi
  • Parking
  • Beautiful countryside views

Location

Set in the heart of the Cornish countryside at Waterloo Farm, North Petherwin, Launceston.

Gallery

House Rules

  • Check-in: 3:00 PM or later
  • Check-out: By 10:00 AM
  • Changeover day: Saturday (peak season)
  • No smoking inside

item.title: Saffron Cottage
item.description:
Welcome to Saffron Cottage

A charming traditional cottage at Waterloo Farm, perfect for couples or small families seeking a peaceful Cornish retreat.

Amenities

  • Fully equipped kitchen
  • Comfortable living spaces
  • WiFi
  • Parking
  • Beautiful countryside views

Location

Set in the heart of the Cornish countryside at Waterloo Farm, North Petherwin, Launceston.

Gallery

House Rules

  • Check-in: 3:00 PM or later
  • Check-out: By 10:00 AM
  • Changeover day: Saturday (peak season)
  • No smoking inside

item.title: Sandmartins
item.description:
Welcome to Sandmartins

A large wheelchair accessible property that can be combined with Haypole Barn for groups up to 16. Perfect for retreats, activity courses, and family gatherings.

Amenities

  • Fully equipped kitchen
  • Wheelchair accessible throughout
  • Accessible bathroom facilities
  • WiFi
  • Parking
  • Beautiful countryside views

Special Notes

Security Deposit: A £100 security deposit is required (returned within 7 days of departure).

item.title: Swallow Barn
item.description:
Welcome to Swallow Barn

A converted barn with character, perfect for families with dogs. Spacious living areas and garden space for your four-legged friends.

Amenities

  • Fully equipped kitchen
  • Spacious living areas
  • WiFi
  • Parking
  • Beautiful countryside views
  • Garden space for dogs

Location

Set in the heart of the Cornish countryside at Waterloo Farm, North Petherwin, Launceston.

Gallery

House Rules

  • Check-in: 3:00 PM or later
  • Check-out: By 10:00 AM
  • Changeover day: Saturday (peak season)
  • No smoking inside
  • Well-behaved dogs welcome

item.title: The Old Apple Tallet
item.description:
Welcome to The Old Apple Tallet

A traditional cottage where your four-legged friends are welcome. Cozy and comfortable with an enclosed garden area.

Amenities

  • Fully equipped kitchen
  • Comfortable living spaces
  • WiFi
  • Parking
  • Beautiful countryside views
  • Enclosed garden area

Location

Set in the heart of the Cornish countryside at Waterloo Farm, North Petherwin, Launceston.

Gallery

House Rules

  • Check-in: 3:00 PM or later
  • Check-out: By 10:00 AM
  • Changeover day: Saturday (peak season)
  • No smoking inside
  • Well-behaved dogs welcome
